original_title: ルパン三世 アルカトラズコネクション
overview: Secretly operating his cruiser as a casino at sea isn’t enough for mafia don Lukino Marcano. He’s also looking for the gold-laden boat wreckage worth the budget of a small country! Lupin sniffs out the plan to recover this long-lost treasure and brings along his partners Jigen, Goemon, and Fujiko for the ride to crash Lukino’s party.
tagline: Lupin and his friends face 7 dangerous criminals.
title: Lupin the Third: Alcatraz Connection
